projects.title: AlphIQ
projects.subtitle: Alephium • Next.js • Web3
projects.description: The all-in-one Alephium dashboard for real-time blockchain analytics, dynamic contract insights, and gamified onchain scoring—complete with live network stats, wallet profiler, token flows, Ralph contract decoder, alerts, quests, and XP-powered achievements.
projects.longDescription: AlphIQ is designed to synthesize information, not just present it. The real challenge in Web3 isn’t finding data; it’s the cognitive burden of connecting disparate points: a transaction, a wallet’s history, a contract’s function, and a community campaign — into a single, understandable narrative. AlphIQ does that heavy lifting for you, weaving the data into a story and giving you a central role to play.

projects.title: Bloom Ideas
projects.subtitle: Ethereum • Solidity • Web3
projects.description: A decentralized platform for collaborative idea sharing and community-driven innovation, built on Etherlink blockchain with NFT rewards for contributors.
projects.longDescription: Bloom-Ideas is a Web3 hackathon platform that transforms idea sharing into a collaborative garden ecosystem. Users can plant ideas, nurture them through community engagement, and earn NFT rewards as their ideas bloom into successful projects.

projects.title: Intellilearn
projects.subtitle: Turn gameplay into Onchain skills
projects.description: Imagine a world where learning blockchain isn't about memorizing complex concepts, but about embarking on epic quests, solving puzzles, and earning rewards that actually matter. Welcome to IntelliLearn - where every game is a lesson, every achievement is a milestone, and every player becomes a Web3 master.
projects.longDescription: Welcome to IntelliLearn, where the future of Web3 education unfolds. We're transforming complex blockchain concepts into an engaging adventure, powered by gamification, virality, and decentralised identity. Join us on this journey to onboard the next billion users into the Web3 universe.

projects.title: AlphIQ Admin Dashboard
projects.subtitle: Alephium • Next.js • Web3
projects.description: Admin dashboard for AlphIQ helps you to see analytics, create , quests, and lot more with seamless UI.
projects.longDescription: AlphIQ Admin Dashboard is a powerful tool that helps you to manage your AlphIQ instance. It allows you to see analytics, create quests, and lot more with seamless UI.

projects.title: EYI
projects.subtitle: Decentralized Identity • Web3 • ENS
projects.description: A comprehensive decentralized identity platform that empowers users to own, verify, and showcase their digital identity across multiple platforms. Connect your ENS to Self, GitHub, X (Twitter), and Farcaster to unlock your EYI badge and enjoy safer, smarter web3 interactions.
projects.longDescription: EYI is a next-generation decentralized identity platform that revolutionizes how users establish and maintain their digital presence in the web3 ecosystem. Built with privacy-first principles, EYI combines multiple verification layers to create a comprehensive identity system that's both secure and user-friendly. The platform addresses the fundamental challenge of digital identity in web3: proving you are who you say you are without compromising your privacy.
features: ENS integration for unified web3 identity
Self Protocol for private personhood verification
Farcaster integration for decentralized social identity
EYI Ring visualization for verification status
